website_summaries.verdict: The supersized, Android-powered Google Nexus 6 is one of the best mobile devices around; tablet, smartphone, or otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: While I knew I would enjoy the OS itself (I only use Nexus devices)
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking it more than I expected. While I knew I would enjoy the OS itself (I only use Nexus devices), I was concerned about the size of phone. However, now that I've had the phone for a few weeks, I realise it's a non-issue. Just a overall good phone and OS. No problems with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work properly, it restarts constantly and I can not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! You get exactly what is advertised. Taking away one star because I received the wrong power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Marvens

customer_reviews.title: it feels good running briskly
customer_reviews.text: just old model & without warranty but got cheapest price. it feels good running briskly. i am glad I bought it@amazon us
customer_reviews.author: u-ko@JP

customer_reviews.title: This phone do not work with Argentina's carriers. Do ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone do not work with Argentina's carriers. Do not support LTE Band 4 even when seller said "Yes" and added this information into product descripton.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, the phone had a small scratch at the back as it was used before. Besides that it was delivered ahead of time and the seller was very responsive. The phone is great, works perfect on LTE B28 which, pure android image is great, good battery life, so so camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Estepa

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they dont make this size anymore
customer_reviews.text: All around nice phone needs more battery life I like the plus size I have no real problems with it Just getting use to the apps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wonder how I can activate the 4G LTE. . because what I get is a H
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: This phone is a great smart phone it is a nice size if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a great smart phone it is a nice size if you like large phones. It is fast and for the most part user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: denese blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Goes great with my Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: I loved my Nexus 7 tablet and when it was time to upgrade my phone decided to get a Nexus 6 to accompany it. It's got a whopping big screen and a great camera and is easy to use. Also, don't panic if your SIM card is too big for it like mine was. You can simply go to your local phone shop and get it trimmed to fit or send for a new nano SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Giverny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, came in just like new, packaging was good, came with a solid charging unit, after about 10 minutes of charging I was using the device as intended. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WOWZER

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend The Nexus 6
customer_reviews.text: Good service as always with Amazon,couldnt be happier with the Nexus 6 so far really is a good phone,couple of years older now but still stands up to a lot of newer mobiles out there,would definitely recommend to anyone looking at buying this model.
customer_reviews.author: Darren McLean

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Got it off Channel z.they are new but trustworthy and fast. The phone is reconditioned and perfect. It came with a new cover of high quality. The phone its self is a great step up from the nexus 5 I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Staggerlee.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bit of kit at a good price. Seller was very good. Happy to recommend. Why waste a grand on an iPhone?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed when i had to return my first mobile due ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed when i had to return my first mobile due to his back stripping off.. i guess LG , samsung do a better work.
customer_reviews.author: Luis L.

customer_reviews.title: Phone often restarts itself when on a call - horrible
customer_reviews.text: Phone restarts by itself often - at least twice daily. Useless phone. Charging port doesn't always work. Compete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and its by far the best phone, yet
customer_reviews.text: Got it as soon as came out, and its by far the best phone, yet! Always Nexus fan ;)
customer_reviews.author: Zaid Amer Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: In love with this phone
customer_reviews.text: My favourite android device I have owned so far. Beautiful screen, excellent stereo sound and perfect functionality. In having this phone I will only be getting vanilla android devices from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Large print phone - just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Should have got one last time I upgraded 2 years ago. Like the look and feel, and the Google-ability thing going on. Doesn't fit in any of my suit jacket phone pockets - small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Dave, Yorks.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is too good but the camera from 2009
customer_reviews.author: Ebraheim

customer_reviews.title: I best Phone available and the best at 6'' :D
customer_reviews.text: The Fastest phone there is in the market... with the basic UI, and the latest updates from Google... I have BIG hands and can barely reach most of the screen with one hand... you can not use it in the car :P Its a pain to reach the back button with the short thumb :D
customer_reviews.author: Manolis K.

customer_reviews.title: it's a little dissapointing one two reasons software is very buggy and the battery is very poor as always needs a charge
customer_reviews.text: For a flagship phone, it's a little dissapointing one two reasons software is very buggy and the battery is very poor as always needs a charge. would have been rather disappointed if paid the full £500 for it. I can live with it for now, the screen size is good and what i need and overall not a bad device if those two issues were not present.
customer_reviews.author: Hakim_moto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly nervous to buy a phone and spend so much with an independent seller as I normally only buy stuff that's processed by Amazon. But the phone came really quickly and was well packaged and box was sealed, also the screen protector and case where nice to have. I've been using three phone for a week or so and I absolutely love it,I thought it might be to big at first coming from using an iPhone 5 but I'm totally used to it and its decimally a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've used since the Nokia 8210. Can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: John Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. Android 5+ is sublime over older versions especially when combined with the screen resolution. All the features (camera, sound, bluetooth, tethering, wifi etc.) are seamless. The battery life is also pretty decent considering! (over a day with 'normal' use) The phone is slightly too big to use one-handed, but it's not really an issue. I'd recommend getting a case and/or a screen protector for it.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Cotts

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sevice
customer_reviews.text: Item overheating no option contact seller , Occasionally freezing or slowomfi down with less use Battery life decreases day by day
customer_reviews.author: 지아

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic phone. Although I've only bought it recently and it is now considered an 'old' device I couldn't be happier. It's incredibly snappy, the battery can easily last 2 days with intermediate usage, the build quality is superb and if is very aesthetically pleasing. Overall it is definitely still able to keep up with current phones and in many cases still perform better than them. It will also be future proof for some time as Google made the phone and they support and update their devices before others.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Myers

customer_reviews.title: Touch sensor
customer_reviews.text: Great phone only missing the touch sensor for logging on. Camera can be a bit slow at times.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBigPotatoes

customer_reviews.title: This phone means business and for me it is pretty much the perfect amount of big
customer_reviews.text: This is a cracking little phone. And by little I mean massive. This phone means business and for me it is pretty much the perfect amount of big. Any bigger or thicker would be too big, but it fits (and stays) in my pockets very nicely and feels sturdy enough sit in the pocket of skinny jeans without the possibility of snapping or damaging the screen. On top of this you get a top notch operating system. I converted from apple to this and I have no intention of going back anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Will Blair

customer_reviews.title: Like a phone but without buttons
customer_reviews.text: It makes phone calls AND takes pictures. It probably does other stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: MASTER MSJ SHAILE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday as it was the one he wanted. He was thrilled it was brand new. One happy husband. Perfect phone. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: natalie bushnell

customer_reviews.text: Functionality, IEEE 802.11ac WiFi performance and screen size: magic! Battery life: poor ("what do you expect?")
customer_reviews.author: Him

customer_reviews.title: fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, but bear In mind its HUGE so find out how it feels in your hands before you buy
customer_reviews.author: thomas bell

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with 'older' eyesight😀
customer_reviews.text: Online manual is useless. Had to go into a phone shop to get predictive text removed as couldnt find instruction. Love the big screen and bigger buttons tho.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Emmerson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, fast delivery, quicker than the estimated time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Charges very very slow
customer_reviews.text: Takes a full day to charge phone ! I've had a Nexus 6 before and never took this long. Phone in great condition but very disappointed in charging phone. Is this the reason you sold it ? Wasn't explained in add ether about battery life and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CALL QUALITY IS POOR! STATIC HISS SOUND - Fantastic Specs otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Nexus 6 and each one has had a terrible static sound coming from the speakers when on a call. There is constant white noise during phone calls which is enough to notice. I couldn't justify spending this amount of money on a phone which can't get the basics rights. There is a whole thread about this issue on google forums (see link below). Motorola/Google are yet to address this problem. !topic/nexus/IwOrn3Fj8U0 Other than this static white noise issue the phone is fantastic but I am not willing to pay for it so sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: tartanic

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Yes its large but I have sold ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Yes its large but I have sold all my other stuff so now its one phone/tablet and one charger. Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: K. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Back cover detaching
customer_reviews.text: The back cover started detaching from the case after 2 weeks of careful use.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisA

customer_reviews.title: nice mobile thanks amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the best mobile .. thanks amazon for shipping this monster ..
customer_reviews.author: alaa alharthi

customer_reviews.title: The screen of the phone is very weak. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen of the phone is very weak. I dropped it once by mistake and the screen crashed into pieces !!
customer_reviews.author: Hemlata Bansal

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Very buggy software. When you finish a call, it essentially freezes 50% of the time. If you have notifications you can get it back, otherwise you have to restart. A bit annoying! Also, it seems to slow right down when in battery saver mode. Takes a few seconds to respond to anything. Screen isn't as touch sensitive as one would expect from a premium phone either. After a week, the size isn't an issue. Easy to get used to it. Screen quality is excellent, photos look great. Not a bad phone, just not as good as I was expecting. Still wonder if I should have gone for the Note 4 every now and then...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Leahy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: no sim card tool ,I do not pay for crap
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: thats pretty much the only reason i only give it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: i got it 2 days after i delivery date, thats pretty much the only reason i only give it 4 stars, the product itself is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gargantuan
customer_reviews.text: Far too big for me. having owned 5" phones and above, the nexus 6 is too big. Lolipop in its current iteration is buggy and the battery life was poor. This of course will improve over time but for the moment, rather expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kandi_kat

customer_reviews.title: Not stuck together properly
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, if Motorola can't glue the back on properly - and this is the second one I've had with this problem - then it doesn't matter how good it is otherwise! For the love of Go,d if you're going to buy one, buy it from Amazon, because Google, Carphone Warehouse etc. won't refund you if it's defective on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Slight mistake
customer_reviews.text: Having owned every Nexus phone and both versions of the 7, this is a step away from the mark. It's a great device with a beautiful screen and great sound, but it's no use as a phone at all - it is absolutely huge. Due to it's vast size, it's completely impossible to operate with one hand which is a necessity for me. I would recommend handling one before considering ordering.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing but was getting really heated up while charging
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this phone for the 3rd time. First 2 times I had to return the phone as it was getting heated up while charging. The third time the phone delivered to me was getting warmed up during the use. This was happening even if I used the phone for 20minutes. This is really frustrating and irritating. You like the phone but every time there are heating up issues.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the quality of this phone. I bought it refurbished in a bit of a rush when my Nexus 4 died suddenly. So far I have no criticism and it has been really easy to set it all up from scratch. The only thing I miss so far is the finger print opening on the Nexus 4 but that is a small thing. I haven't taken many photos yet but what I have taken look good. All in all an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right - perfect! I had acquired every nexus phone from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just right - perfect! I had acquired every nexus phone from the beginning; but had had to stray to Samsung territory with Note 2 and then Note 3 for the expanded screen size. Great phones no doubt, but they are filled with too many un-needed apps and trickeries that kept coming my way and had to be also updated occasionally. Very annoying indeed. Now here's a 6 in nexus - what else can I ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good built-in quality (I have dropped it accidentally a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using this phone for a while now and it is working almost flawlessly. Very good built-in quality (I have dropped it accidentally a couple of times) and it is still scratch-less, this is a miracle compared to my previous Note 3 which had an awful build in quality. Although, large in size but it is comfortable to hold still.
customer_reviews.author: Yosr Gado

customer_reviews.title: Charging phone - Hot - warning
customer_reviews.text: The phone is huge, the keyboard is not always reactive and the phone heats up enormously when charging the battery....Where can we find the radio in this phone? I am really disappointed with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing compared to previous Nexus phones
customer_reviews.text: The screen should be star - but it isn't as good as my old HTC Max One. Performance is impressive as are the regular Android updates which is the only major plus for this phone. You buy a big phone for a great screen - and this just fails.
customer_reviews.author: craigm

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality problem from the onboafrd speakers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Becareful of the speakers. I play music out loud and the sound would dip, especially when under 50% battery, when on full volume. I had two units do the same. I think it is a hardware issue, do your RESEARCH!!
customer_reviews.author: park3r

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: Been using this phone for a few months now and it's the best phone I've ever had. Probably a bit too big but the best phone out there for this price unless you're willing to fork out an extra £60 for something like an LG G4.
customer_reviews.author: John Dell'Armi

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice size (it took me a couple days to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this phone! It's a really nice size (it took me a couple days to get used to going from an iPhone 4s) and it performs well! The battery life is not the best, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Peder Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: best phone i ever used in my
customer_reviews.text: absolutely speechless to this phone, best phone i ever used in my life
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER FUNG

customer_reviews.title: fully satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered the next day as stated, fully satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bertrand G.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Nexus so far!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone in all ways. Size. Shape and classy look and comfortable feel. This phone may not be for everybody but I'm a lover of large screen phones anyway. Ergonomics are all good. Stock android may not be as exciting as touchwiz but to me it's ideal and emits a serious tone to it as opposed to all the gimmicky touchwiz stuff. The camera is ok but I don't use phones for taking photos so it's not a problem for me.Finally the amoled display gives this phone the perfect finish.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: + Screen is incredibly clear (2560 x 1440 resolution) + Phone charges very fast + Performance is superb. No lag whatsoever + Size is great for larger hands + Both cameras are great + NFC for contact-less payments + Internet speeds are fast. 2x faster than my last phone + Speakers are clear and loud + Updated to Android 5.1.1 - Screen has a slight green tint, however barely noticeable - Possibly too large for small pockets or small hands - Battery life is good but not great
customer_reviews.author: ⭐ 𝓙𝓪𝓶𝓮𝓼 ⭐

customer_reviews.title: So near so far
customer_reviews.text: The phone was OK, not convinced it was new when it arrived as there were lots of marks and scratches all over the screen protector. The phone itself in use was OK, it is big even for my large hands, my biggest gripe was that after two weeks the battery stats stopped working and it constantly showed 100% full all the time, when I looked on Google there were quite a few people having the same issue, so I decided to return it for a refund, which Amazon did faultlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mc

customer_reviews.title: It's always updated to the latest Android version nice and early
customer_reviews.text: This phone is huge. I can't use it with one hand, which I knew would be the case before I bought it. It works perfectly after several months of owning it. It's always updated to the latest Android version nice and early.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This is "The Phone" of the year - maybe longer...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, if your hands are comfortable with a large phone you must buy this. It will alway have the latest version of Android on it, screen looks great, sounds is amazing - but of course movies and music are a lot better with external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Geddes

customer_reviews.title: ... years after release this is still one of the best smart phones ever made
customer_reviews.text: Even two years after release this is still one of the best smart phones ever made. Battery life for me lasts a cool 3 days of moderate use; camera is excellent; performance stellar. Yes it is very big but doesn't feel as big today as it would've on release now big phones are more normal and bigger is always better for content and use in my opinion just make sure your clothes can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Danny J. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: I might be a bit biased, because I'm completely in love with the Nexus line, but this is the best phone I've ever had. The size was a bit much at first, but I adjusted within a few hours - now, regular phones feel too small! As always with Nexus phones, performance is superb.
customer_reviews.author: MCH

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant phone. I recently switched from iOS to android. Id say its best to ignore reviews that give the screen size as a negative. If you don't know how big a 6 inch phone is, then be safe and get a smaller one. Anyway, great phone, great specs and great all round experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone, always loved it. Mine smashed so I bought this from refurb phone. Arrived quickly. Glad I went through Amazon. However charger was a dodgy one so I wouldn't use it. Hardly any marks on it. Seems to be working good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Give me an option to turn off the encryption!
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, probably not as snappy as my old nexus 5 though, it stalls quite a bit, but I think that it is due to the always on encryption, enforced by Google, please give me an easy option to turn off the encryption
customer_reviews.author: Antony C.

customer_reviews.title: A good size screen
customer_reviews.text: A good size screen, battery time better than some others, Android keep the system up to date automatically.A very competative smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone but I also hate it
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone but I also hate it. Speakers fizz and pop and Motorola deny it being a software glitch, take it back to android 5.0 and its perfect. The camera is also shocking. Slow, bad quality. If you discount those from the equation the phones decent. Love hate relationship right there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Shane Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Nexus 6 - Curate's Egg
customer_reviews.text: An improvement on the Nexus 5 in some respects - small tablet really. Better screen, camera and so on. But for old duffers like me, it is annoying not to have any basic instruction leaflet. My contacts are duplicating like rabbits and I cannot find why. Also, despite T4 M4 status, the calls volume seems less clear and quieter than the Nexus 5
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Some annoying bugs in the new version of Android OS but overall happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Klauz

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Within two days of light use, the dvice's screen went completely black & no response whatsoever despite several troubleshootings attempted! Discussion forums indicate many complaints, It's absolutely disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Regret buying this phone it was easily hacked screen broke easily very inconvenient size not user friendly camera is bad
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: hard to repair
customer_reviews.text: nice product, but keep in mind the only way to repair a smashed glass is sending the phone to Motorola repair center for 7 days(!). I couldn't find a shop to repair it in London. Really disappointed. Going back to Apple products, at least I'll have same-day repairs in Apple Stores.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Volume down key not working This device not original nexus 6 Very heavy I bought another from another seller different I So bad
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMAD H ALFADHLI

customer_reviews.title: the colors are fantastic and overall it's the crowning feature of this handset
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nexus 6 (64GB White) and have no regrets. The screen size is superb, the colors are fantastic and overall it's the crowning feature of this handset. With the 5.1.1 update most of the software bugs that other users report have been fixed and the overall user experience is superb. Having come from HTC and Samsung phones the regular updates that the Nexus gets is well worth it and provides a true android experience.
customer_reviews.author: J Stewpot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's an international phone can't get it to work on Verizon
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Be advised that LTE on this phone won't work with AT&T because it's an international version.
customer_reviews.author: Buyalot

product_meta.title: Motorola Nexus 6 XT1100 32GB 4G LTE Unlocked GSM Android v5.0 Smartphone - Blue - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description: A snappy processor quickly accesses your favorite apps, Web pages, and games on the large 6" screen. With high-definition video recording capabilities and a camera that takes clear photographs, you can capture all of life's important moments.
feature_bullets: 5.96" AMOLED Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen w/ Protective Corning Gorilla Glass 3
Android v5.0 (Lollipop), Quad-Core 2.7 GHz Krait 450 Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm Snapdragon 85, Adreno 420 Graphics
13 Megapixel Camera (4128 x 3096 pixels) w/ Autofocus, optical image stabilization, dual-LED (ring) flash + Front-facing 2 Megapixel Camera

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars98 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
